original_text: They went into the ark with Noah, two and two of all flesh in which there was the breath of life.
korean_text: 무릇 생명의 기운이 있는 육체가 둘씩 노아에게 나아와 방주로 들어갔으니

sentences.original_text: They went into the ark with Noah,
two and two of all flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 육체는 두 씩 짝을 지어

sentences.original_text: in which there was the breath of life.
